1.0.0.name: wordpress/easypayway-is-a-bangladeshi-payment-gateway-with-the-woocommerce-plugin
1.0.0.description: This is the EasyPayWay payment gateway for WooCommerce. Allows you to use EasyPayWay payment gateway with the WooCommerce plugin. EasyPayWay is a Bangladeshi Payment Gateway. Allows you to use EasyPayWay payment gateway with the WooCommerce plugin. It uses the redirect method, the user is redirected to EasyPayWay so that you don't have to install an SSL certificate on your site.
